meanings.sent1: The hazed students felt scared and confused.
meanings.sent2: The hazed newcomers were asked to perform embarrassing tasks.
meanings.sent3: The hazed group had to wear silly costumes all day.
meanings.sent4: The hazed individuals were lost in a fog of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The hazed recruits were pushed to their limits during the initiation.

meanings.definition: Covered or clouded with a haze.
meanings.sent1: The hazed morning sky obscured the rising sun.
meanings.sent2: The hazed landscape looked mysterious and dreamy.
meanings.sent3: The hazed view made it hard to see the distant mountains clearly.
meanings.sent4: The hazed memories of the past lingered in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The hazed atmosphere created a sense of calm and tranquility.
